sentences.en: ...a series of lectures by Professor Eric Robinson.
sentences.cn: …埃里克·鲁滨逊教授的系列讲座。

sentences.en: After my lecture, the students began to overwhelm me with questions.
sentences.cn: 讲课之后, 学生们开始问一系列问题,使我不知所措.

sentences.en: Attendance at Professor Smith's lecture fell off sharply that evening.
sentences.cn: 那晚去听史密斯教授讲演的人显著减少了.

sentences.en: Chuck would lecture me, telling me to get a haircut.
sentences.cn: 查克就会数落我，让我去理一下发。

sentences.en: Don't lecture at me. I don't have to do what you say!
sentences.cn: 别教训我, 我可不是非听你的不可.

sentences.en: He lectures on European art at Manchester University.
sentences.cn: 他在曼彻斯特大学讲授欧洲艺术。

sentences.en: He regularly gives lectures on modern French literature.
sentences.cn: 他经常讲授法国现代文学课程。

sentences.en: His lecture was illustrated with slides taken during the expedition.
sentences.cn: 他在讲演中使用了探险时拍摄到的幻灯片。

sentences.en: His lecture was readily intelligible to all the students.
sentences.cn: 他的讲课学生们都能轻松地听懂。

sentences.en: His lecture was so pedantic and uninteresting.
sentences.cn: 他的讲座学究气太浓，没意思。

sentences.en: I take it as a pleasure to attend your lecture.
I was asked to lecture on Chinese literature yesterday.
sentences.cn: 昨天我应邀去讲中国文学.

sentences.en: I'll return to this point in my lecture in a little while.
sentences.cn: 过一会儿我还要回过来讲这个问题.

sentences.en: In his lecture on geology, he touched on the subject of climate.
sentences.cn: 他在关于地质学的报告中, 也涉及气候问题.

sentences.en: Our captain gave us a stern lecture on safety.
sentences.cn: 船长就安全问题严厉地训斥了我们一顿。

sentences.en: Professor Pearson gave the inaugural lecture in the new lecture theatre.
sentences.cn: 皮尔逊教授在新的阶梯讲堂发表了启用演说.

sentences.en: She recast her lecture as a radio talk.
sentences.cn: 她把讲稿修改成了一篇广播讲话。

sentences.en: She then invited him to Atlanta to lecture on the history of art.
sentences.cn: 她于是邀请他去亚特兰大讲授艺术史。

sentences.en: We picked up our conference materials and filed into the lecture hall.
sentences.cn: 我们领了会议材料后鱼贯进入讲演厅。
